author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-912: OutOfMemory error on continuous execution of SQL statement

author: leif
msg: If a jar containing components is included in the classpath, fortress will always attempt to register any and all component classes.  If one of those classes can not be loaded due to a missing dependency, an exception was being thrown that would prevent fortress from starting.

This modification will log such problems as a warning on startup, but the failure to load the class will not prevent fortress from starting.   If at a later point the class is actually referenced, it will throw an exception at that point.
This should not affect any existing applications as they would not have ben able to start up in the first place.
